HTML5 - Progression - 20 years ago...

And then we printed, and to get content we would scan and OCR it... and format it again to print. Imagine how much time and money were wasted in the process! “So, how to “fix” this situation?” By creating digital content that can be properly stored, exploitable, exchangeable, extensible and reusable through digital systems.
